tactic-1.title: Playing with feelings
tactic-1.description: Using your feelings to trick you into doing something.
tactic-1.example: A TikTok comment says, 'If you donâ€™t repost this, your Among Us account will get DELETED!'

tactic-2.title: Jokes that trick people
tactic-2.description: Sharing funny memes as if theyâ€™re real news.
tactic-2.example: A Minecraft meme says: 'NEW GLITCH: PRESS ALT+F4 TO GET FREE DIAMONDS! ðŸ’Ž' â€” kids try it, but pressing ALT+F4 just closes their game!'

tactic-3.title: Fake Videos/Audio
tactic-3.description: Using tech to make someone look or sound like they did/said something they didnâ€™t.
tactic-3.example: A YouTube short shows Taylor Swift saying, 'I hate cats!' â€” but itâ€™s AI-generated.

tactic-4.title: Only showing the good parts
tactic-4.description: Hiding bad stuff to make something look better.
tactic-4.example: Your friend brags, 'I got 100% on one math test!' but doesnâ€™t mention the five Fâ€™s he got.

tactic-5.title: Trick headlines
tactic-5.description: Headlines that make you clickâ€¦ but the story is boring or fake.
tactic-5.example: OMG! What this ROBOT can do will SHOCK you! â†’ Itâ€™s just an ad for a toy car.

tactic-6.title: Crazy secret stories
tactic-6.description: Making up wild stories with no proof.
tactic-6.example: Roblox is spying on you through your mic to sell your voice to aliens! (Nope, Roblox just uses mics for voice chat.)

tactic-7.title: Sock Puppetry
tactic-7.description: Using fake accounts to make it seem like lots of people agree with something.
tactic-7.example: A TikTok post says, 'Mr. Beast is quitting music forever!' â€” but it's totally fake.

tactic-8.title: Scaring people
tactic-8.description: Making small problems seem like disasters.
tactic-8.example: A Snapchat story screams, 'If you donâ€™t share this in 10 seconds, Snapchat will BLOCK YOUR ACCOUNT!' (Nope, itâ€™s just trying to go viral.)

tactic-9.title: Fake accounts
tactic-9.description: Pretending to be someone famous or a friend online.
tactic-9.example: An Instagram account named '@Real_Taylor_Swift' asks you for money.

tactic-10.title: Messing with your brain
tactic-10.description: Making you doubt what you know is true.
tactic-10.example: A classmate accuses you of cheating, then denies it: 'I never said that! Youâ€™re imagining thingsâ€”you must be stressed.'

tactic-11.title: Truth
tactic-11.example: You can look it up and see that it's real!
